content.text:
# Henry R. Luce Award

The Henry R. Luce Award is an award in the field of journalism given by Time Inc. to recognize "editorial excellence in print, digital and multimedia categories"; it is presented annually to articles and blog posts published in Time Inc. media outlets. The award serves as a memorial for American journalist Henry Robinson Luce (1898â€“1967).
